text: Cleopatra is an 1876 opera by Lauro Rossi to a libretto by Marco D’Arienzo (1811–1877) for the Teatro Grande Triest. ==Recording== *Cleopatra - Dimitra Theodossiou (Cleopatra), Alessandro Liberatore (Marco Antonio), Paolo Pecchioli (Ottavio Cesare), Sebastian Catana (Diomede), William Corrò (Proculejo), Tiziana Carraro (Ottavia) & Paola Gardina (Carmiana) Orchestra Filarmonica Marchigiana & Coro Lirico Marchigiano ‘V. Bellini’, David Crescenzi. NaxosGramophone Magazine, June 2011 DVD or 2CD ==References== Category:operas Category:1876 operas
title: Cleopatra (Rossi)
